MidPoint

MidPoint is a pragmatic provisioning system. Currently midPoint is a complete identity management system that has reached and exceeded many commercial IDM offerings. MidPoint is a comprehensive provisioning solution with many unique features. It is a truly universal system that can be deployed in almost any environment.

Fiche technique

Utiliser MidPoint avec CAS

Live démo MidPoint : http://demo.evolveum.com (Login: administrator Password: 5ecr3t)

Notes de déploiement

Pour commencer * Instanciation d'une VM CentOs sur Open Stack depuis une machine interactive du CC <code text> $ nova boot –key-name=cloudkey –image=official-centos-7x-x86_64 –flavor=m1.small idm </code> Une fois la VM instanciée, s'y connecter avec le user centos ==== Installation ==== ==== Personnalisation ==== ===== Accès ===== URL temporaire http://134.158.37.14/
